page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: Most of this land is farmland but part of the{Sennen}village is included in}it.{Land's End Radio, Penrose Farm, {Atlantica Chalet Park}and{Skewjack {Farm }are some of the places in this block.There are many country lanes and interesting walks plus many farms. {Land's End Radio}is the main wireless station which takes messages from ships and sends messages to ships. {Penrose}is one of the oldest and most} interesting farm around here. Many surfers come to stay at{Atlantica {Chalet Park.}There are a few springs which lead into{Penberth}river which leads down to{Penberth Cove.}The country lanes have many wild flowers growing in the hedges.
